channel.title: Meta Spaceglasses
channel.description:
Basically, what these Spaceglasses are, is personal 3D holographic glasses that you can interact with. You know, like what Tony Stark does, except without these glasses. You'd think that these would come with a hefty price, but surprisingly, they are only $677 to pre-order them. They are being released sometime in December/January. And the really cool thing is, is that you can make your own apps with Unity 3D if you know how to. Or, you can simply download the apps.
The website for these is at: https://www.spaceglasses.com/
What do you guys think about these glasses? Other than the appearance, because it is a little bulky/funky looking.
But, I've also heard that there either is, or they are working on another look for them to look a lot better:
[center][img]http://i.i.cbsi.com/cnwk.1d/i/tim2/2013/08/09/Screen_Shot_2013-08-09_at_7.22.25_AM_610x328.png[/img][/center]
